column2: Books of all publishers are displayed while specific publisher is selected.
Microsoft Windows [Version 10.0.19042.1466], Microsoft EdgeВерсия 98.0.1108.43 (Официальная сборка) (64-разрядная версия), prod: https://book-ye.com.ua/
Сhoose any publishing office in any language.
Books of all publishers are displayed while specific publisher is selected.
Only books from the selected publisher are displayed.
The Ukrainian alphabet is not displayed.
Microsoft Windows [Version 10.0.19042.1466], Microsoft EdgeВерсия 98.0.1108.43 (Официальная сборка) (64-разрядная версия), prod: https://book-ye.com.ua/
Double click on the "Ukrainian language" button.
The letters of the Ukrainian alphabet are not appearing, appear letters of the English alphabet and disappear from the English alphabet.
Each alphabet has its own letters.
Everything returns to its place, after double-clicking on the English language.
Specific reaction can't be selected (smiling emoticon with one tear) on any message.
Open a registered account in the Instagram app.
Put a reaction (smiling emoticon with one tear) on any message.
Specific reaction can't be selected (smiling emoticon with one tear) on any message.
Specific reaction can be selected (smiling emoticon with one tear) on any message.
